metadata.synopsis: Memnos - the supporting optional tiefling character in the Captive Goblin situation, Friend to Arka.
metadata.how_to_trigger: repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 209.42, 26.38, 407.204. trigger attack on DEN5. in recon "killcombat"6. goto 208.41, 35.46, 446.977. Talk with Memnos8. if you get DEN_CapturedGoblin_GuardsGrieve then Talk to Memnos again

0.speaker: Memnos
0.text: So much death. So much waste.
0.context: NodeContext: Arka is dead. Cold grief - not falling apart, but trying to keep it together.

2.speaker: Memnos
2.text: Can't talk now. Arka needs me.

3.speaker: Memnos
3.text: Heard you killed the goblin boss. I hope this gives Arka some measure of peace.
